verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Go <S%H1980><s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto <S%H935>them<s%>, and bring them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, into <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H3957>chambers<s%>, and give them <S%H3196>wine<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>.

Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2970>Jaazaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2262>Habazziniah<s%>, and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and all his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%>;

and I <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, into the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3012>Igdaliah<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which was <S%H681>by<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, which was <S%H4605>above<s%> the <S%H3957>chamber<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%>, the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H5592>threshold<s%>.

And I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%> <S%H1375>bowls<s%> <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and <S%H3563>cups<s%>; and I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8354>them<s%>, Drink ye <S%H3196>wine<s%>.

But they <S%H559>said<s%>, We will <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%>; for <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%>, our <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, Ye shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%>, neither <S%H1121>ye<s%>, nor your sons, <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>:

neither shall ye <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, nor <S%H2232>sow<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, nor <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, nor have <S%H3117>any<s%>; but all your days ye shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%>; that ye may <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H6440>in<s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> wherein ye <S%H1481>sojourn<s%>.

And we have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%>, our <S%H1>father<s%>, in all that he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H8354>us<s%>, to drink no <S%H3196>wine<s%> all our <S%H3117>days<s%>, <S%H802>we<s%>, our wives, our <S%H1121>sons<s%>, or our <S%H1323>daughters<s%>;
nor to <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> for us to dwell <S%H3427>in<s%>; neither have we <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>, nor <S%H7704>field<s%>, nor <S%H2233>seed<s%>:
but we have dwelt <S%H3427>in<s%> <S%H168>tents<s%>, and have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%>, and <S%H6213>done<s%> according to all that <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> commanded <S%H6680>us<s%>.

But it came to <S%H5019>pass<s%>, when Nebuchadrezzar <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%>, that we <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H935>Come<s%>, and let us <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of the <S%H2428>army<s%> of the <S%H758>Syrians<s%>; so we <S%H3427>dwell<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H1980>Go<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, Will ye not <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> to <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to my <S%H1697>words<s%>? <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%>, that he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>, are <S%H6965>performed<s%>; and unto this <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8085>none<s%>, for they obey their <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment<s%>: but I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto <S%H7925>you<s%>, rising up early and <S%H1696>speaking<s%>; and ye have not hearkened unto <S%H8085>me<s%>.

I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> also unto you all my <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saying, <S%H7725>Return<s%> ye now every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%>, and <S%H3190>amend<s%> your <S%H4611>doings<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%> not <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3427>them<s%>, and ye shall dwell in the <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers<s%>: but ye have not <S%H5186>inclined<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%>, nor hearkened unto <S%H8085>me<s%>.

Forasmuch as the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> have <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>, but this people hath not hearkened unto <S%H8085>me<s%>;

therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H935>Behold<s%>, I will bring upon <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and upon all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H1696>them<s%>; because I have spoken unto <S%H8085>them<s%>, but they have not heard; and I have <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H6030>them<s%>, but they have not answered.

And <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7397>Rechabites<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: Because ye have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H3082>Jonadab<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H8104>kept<s%> all his <S%H4687>precepts<s%>, and <S%H6213>done<s%> according unto all that he commanded <S%H6680>you<s%>;

therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H3122>Jonadab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7394>Rechab<s%> shall not <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.
